amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to increase funding by $500,000 for the Office of Employee Assistance under the Office of the Chief Administrative Officer of the House of Representatives to be pulled from the Architect of the Capitol, Capitol Grounds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Esty (CT) amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A046) offered by Ms. Esty (CT).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Esty (CT) amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
